heading: Today
text: Sun mixing with clouds. Breezy to windy, and mild.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Windy. Becoming cloudy. Some showers after midnight.

heading: Friday
text: Rain likely, mixing with or changing to snow after noon, mainly in the west.
temperature: Upper 40s and 50s, falling west to east after noon

heading: Saturday
text: Partly sunny. Chance of late-day snow showers in far northern NY.
temperature: Mid 20s to mid 30s, north to south
